__e: Everyone here knows what happened to the Indian, and why. [Jody] No, you don't, Dad.
Now, you been an Indian, you know what it feels like.
So if you place any value on your life you better take your Indian friend and get out of here fast.
They're not the same kind of Indians we have in America, darling.
Well, I know one Indian who believes you're here to make sure he's dead.
I'm sorry-- You don't look like any Indian I've ever seen.
